categories: Category:Imperial Army officers of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Nalto was a Human male who served as a lieutenant in the Imperial Army of the Sith Empire on the planet Balmorra during the Cold War. A subordinate of Captain Ardmore, Nalto was tasked with reestablishing communication with Lieutenant Torsin's unit after the squad went missing in the Gorinth Agricultural Sector.
Nalto appears in hologram form in conversations for the mission "Salting the Fields" for Imperial players in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic.
